supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-19 (in mm), (1) 26 x 26, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (2) 65 x 22, (A) 9 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (3) 55 x 23, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (4) 67 x 33, (A) 6 lines, top margin (?), (B) blank, (5) 58 x 26, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (6) 55 x 26, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (7) 31 x 18, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 20 x 12, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (9) 24 x 26, (A) 3 lines, left margins, (B) blank, (10) 40 x 37, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (11) 43 x 47, (A) 4 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (12) 43 x 31, (A) 7 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (13) 52 x 55, (A) 3 lines, right margin, (B) blank, (14) 31 x 14, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) 5 lines, 2 col. (?), no margins, (15) 39 x 28, (A) 3 lines, right margin, (B) 3 lines, left margin, (16) 67 x 43, (A) 3 lines, top bottom margin, (B) blank, (17) 60 x 18, (A) 8 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (18) 65 x 22, (A) 9 lines (?), no margins, (B) blank, (19) 60 x 16, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) 3 lines, top margin (?)

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.
